helpText:
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» **Total Available Commands:**

â€¢ <prefix>ping (all)
- `check if alive or not`

â€¢ <prefix>repo 
- `show the bot source code(all)`

â€¢ <prefix>start | <prefix>help
- `show the help for commands(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>mode | <prefix>switch
- `switch the stream mode (audio/video)(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>p | <prefix>play [song name | youtube link]
- `play a song in vc, if already playing add to queue(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>radio | <prefix>stream [radio url | stream link]
- `play a live stream in vc, if already playing add to queue(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>pl | <prefix>playlist [youtube playlist link]
- `play the whole youtube playlist at once(all)`

â€¢ <prefix>skip | <prefix>next
- `skip to the next song(owner)`

â€¢ <prefix>m | <prefix>mute
- `mute the current stream(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>um | <prefix>unmute
- `unmute the muted stream(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>ps | <prefix>pause
- `pause the current stream(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>rs | <prefix>resume
- `resume the paused stream(sudo/users)`

â€¢ <prefix>list | <prefix>queue
- `show the songs in the queue`

â€¢ <prefix>mix | <prefix>shuffle
- `shuffle the queued playlist(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>loop | <prefix>repeat
- `enable or disable the loop mode(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>lang | language [language code]
- `set the bot language in a group(owner/sudo)`

â€¢ <prefix>ip | <prefix>import
- `import queue from exported file(all)`

â€¢ <prefix>ep | <prefix>export
- `export the queue for import in future(all)`

â€¢ <prefix>stop | <prefix>leave
- `leave from vc and clear the queue(owner/sudo)`

**Support ~** @Legend_K_Userbot
